attributes.action:
Help private tenants with the cost of living.
Introduce a cap for private rent.
attributes.additional_details: Private tenants looks not be protected by any law. Cost of houses and living are massively increasing and most of the time negotiations of renting price if not regulated under a law they not be accepted. Most of the people they have not a salary increase.
attributes.background: Government to introduce a law, regulations, plan protection or price cap about private rent as price of housing are increasing massively to help and protect private tenants with cost of living

rejection.details:
We think this petiiton is similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623326

If you'd prefer a limit on rent increases, you could start a petition explaining what limit you'd like to see.
